title: Add --service-pull-request
body: This option adds `service_pull_request` key to JSON, which, according to [Coveralls docs](https://docs.coveralls.io/api-reference), is "[u]sed for updating the status and/or commenting". Indeed, when I built my project with `--service-pull-request $TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST`, it generated [a report with a button](https://coveralls.io/builds/27746270) that led to the PR.

title: Log duplicated top-level message only once
Add a workaround for a JSVM bug causing many functions to be named 'top-level'
Bump quick-xml from 0.17.1 to 0.17.2

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:

title: Bump log from 0.4.8 to 0.4.10

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [log](https://github.com/rust-lang/log) from 0.4.8 to 0.4.10.
Changelog *Sourced from [log's changelog](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## [0.4.10] - 2019-12-16 > > ### Fixed > > * Fixed the `log!` macros so they work in expression context (this regressed in `0.4.9`, which has been yanked). > > ## [0.4.9] - 2019-12-12 > > ### Minimum Supported Rust Version > > This release bumps the minimum compiler version to `1.31.0`. This was mainly needed for `cfg-if`, > but between `1.16.0` and `1.31.0` there are a lot of language and library improvements we now > take advantage of. > > ### New > > * Unstable support for capturing key-value pairs in a record using the `log!` macros > > ### Improved > > * Better documentation for max level filters. > * Internal updates to line up with bumped MSRV
Commits - [`4e196f9`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/4e196f927d0e87a1bf799e57a9582e7a6003bcd1) Merge pull request [#371](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/rust-lang/log/issues/371) from KodrAus/cargo/0.4.10 - [`fbd138a`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/fbd138acb51dfd60f204c6101a9fbaf29b757957) prepare for 0.4.10 release - [`bf0d075`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/bf0d075fc50925fc64610df4d0fb3b9d6a1e479e) make macro style consistent - [`62c0975`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/62c0975cf7cb3f8f97adfbf79418b4877d9d9e33) Merge pull request [#370](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/rust-lang/log/issues/370) from KodrAus/fix/macro-expr-context - [`1a7ffda`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/1a7ffda379de76248c8c90678f0c5b6f97d4087c) fix up macro use in expr context - [`87fc152`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/87fc152d40f06623e109ead03cba0431da0e7f73) Merge pull request [#368](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/rust-lang/log/issues/368) from KodrAus/cargo/0.4.9 - [`e0816a2`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/e0816a2e4c35a90bd7e5fe303cf01724399714f7) add missing link to changelog - [`0c0eaa3`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/0c0eaa304e0fb637eabb0210628c1e6080cf896a) prepare for 0.4.9 release - [`efcc39c`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/efcc39c5217edae4f481b73357ca2f868bfe0a2c) Merge pull request [#367](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/rust-lang/log/issues/367) from TethysSvensson/master - [`4f5de62`](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/commit/4f5de62a797255c9281afe77adeaf75aa9be3e5a) The 'static lifetime is inferred in the definition of static items - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/rust-lang/log/compare/0.4.8...0.4.10)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=log&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.4.8&new-version=0.4.10)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=log&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.4.8&new-version=0.4.10) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. title: Bump chrono from 0.4.9 to 0.4.10

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [chrono](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono) from 0.4.9 to 0.4.10.
Changelog *Sourced from [chrono's changelog](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## 0.4.10 > > ### Improvements > > * `DateTime::parse_from_str` is more than 2x faster in some cases. ([@​michalsrb](https://github.com/michalsrb) > [#358](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/358)) > * Significant improvements to no-std and alloc support (This should also make > many format/serialization operations induce zero unnecessary allocations) > ([@​CryZe](https://github.com/CryZe) [#341](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/341)) > > ### Features > > * Functions that were accepting `Iterator` of `Item`s (for example > `format_with_items`) now accept `Iterator` of `Borrow`, so one can > use values or references. ([@​michalsrb](https://github.com/michalsrb) [#358](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/358)) > * Add built-in support for structs with nested `Option` etc fields > ([@​manifest](https://github.com/manifest) [#302](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/302)) > > ### Internal/doc improvements > > * Use markdown footnotes on the `strftime` docs page ([@​qudlibetor](https://github.com/qudlibetor) [#359](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/359)) > * Migrate from `try!` -> `?` (question mark) because it is now emitting > deprecation warnings and has been stable since rustc 1.13.0 > * Deny dead code
Commits - [`5905935`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/59059352c1f0b837e296bcab04f04dc879d4e235) Merge pull request [#361](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/361) from quodlibetor/deny-dead-code - [`41700d1`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/41700d101eea01c6f43917304f122dfbfac0ff86) Remove unused constant, deny(dead_code) - [`5b4fc23`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/5b4fc23bcb005bf21efe78e6be2a0f40abae5bf7) Merge pull request [#360](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/360) from quodlibetor/chrono-0_4_10 - [`288f1dd`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/288f1dd76f7e8850d26dd17e29705153eb250aa1) Merge pull request [#356](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/356) from quodlibetor/num_days_from_epoch-docs - [`670561b`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/670561b4c11f5785f689dcb1dac9f5a3c1915a21) Prepare for and Bump Chrono version to 0.4.10 - [`6622bdc`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/6622bdcae725691e346f2b1c264a048b0373b27c) Replace all uses of `try!` with question mark - [`46f8267`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/46f8267c614a3889f0ff4e5841fb9e5c667c2bfb) Merge pull request [#358](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/358) from michalsrb/optimize-parsing - [`b717e04`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/b717e0442c6a61b0377c0b19f315ba40a7e97716) Handle some semantic merge conflicts - [`27f5e5e`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/27f5e5e9b39a72723a41b11a23cbda16c8355b1c) Temporarily globally allow deprecated - [`0b8c248`](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/commit/0b8c248791475a519bd9a0c538359d382314a1fb) Fix build with rust 1.13.0 - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/chronotope/chrono/compare/v0.4.9...v0.4.10)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=chrono&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.4.9&new-version=0.4.10)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=chrono&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.4.9&new-version=0.4.10) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. title: Bump num_cpus from 1.11.0 to 1.11.1

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [num_cpus](https://github.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus) from 1.11.0 to 1.11.1.
Changelog *Sourced from [num_cpus's changelog](https://github.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v1.11.1 > > #### Fixes > > - Use `mem::zeroed` instead of `mem::uninitialized`.
Commits - [`428811d`](https://github.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus/commit/428811d2a00920479fdb7dc9e9e2902e52e92e4b) v1.11.1 - [`a24f544`](https://github.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus/commit/a24f544dc6b0561d725706b770209e3dd6902bb2) Replace `mem::uninitialized()` with `mem::zeroed()` ([#83](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus/issues/83)) - See full diff in [compare view](https://github.com/seanmonstar/num_cpus/compare/v1.11.0...v1.11.1)

title: Bump crossbeam from 0.7.2 to 0.7.3

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [crossbeam](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam) from 0.7.2 to 0.7.3.
Changelog *Sourced from [crossbeam's changelog](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > # Version 0.7.3 > > - Fix breakage with nightly feature due to [rust-lang/rust#65214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/65214). > - Bump `crossbeam-channel` to `0.4`. > - Bump `crossbeam-epoch` to `0.8`. > - Bump `crossbeam-queue` to `0.2`. > - Bump `crossbeam-utils` to `0.7`.
Commits - [`28ad2b7`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/28ad2b7e015832b47db7e389dd9ebce3e94b3adb) Update versions in readmes - [`c98fea1`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/c98fea12e67447d71065539fe2cdde545ea57d8b) Merge [#444](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/444) - [`d953f49`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/d953f49ecc7eb5fe6c271b018a4a753ba435ee58) Add compatibility section to readme - [`c76f145`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/c76f1451820009bb81bbc0ccf782eb976637667f) Prepare for the next release - [`99762ee`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/99762ee63333fcd7b9abcd1c5ede835cba68c438) Merge [#442](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/442) - [`ebb6b5f`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/ebb6b5fe6d7423a97a7762fa5fde7cb2d801fd39) Do not perform superfluous bounds checks on drop - [`d2ab7a5`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/d2ab7a5c437322e01de7807e3a7803249ec28d20) Update LICENSE-APACHE - [`f54db88`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/f54db88d1a66eea8338176ae288b91a26764f7b7) Merge [#437](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/437) - [`caa52c4`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/caa52c4e841c11bf2a26489635696080d7deca21) Merge [#436](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/436) - [`af68803`](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/commit/af688031a219f6586b7e8e54719087bc0a1bc693) Merge [#438](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/438) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-0.7.2...crossbeam-0.7.3)
